Cover.Stage3: • Cannot be targeted by attacks that require sight

Flanked.Description: Attacks from the target's peripherals or behind their view
Flanked.Stage1: • Attacks against the target have a -1 Crit threshold
Flanked.Stage2: • Attacks against the target have a -2 Crit threshold
Flanked.Stage3: • Attacks against the target have a -5 Crit threshold

Hidden.Description: Unable to be seen or unable to be targeted for attacks
Hidden.Stage1: • First attack from hidden gives the target Surprised 1
Hidden.Stage2: • First attack from hidden gives the target Surprised 2
Hidden.Stage3: • First attack from hidden gives the target Surprised 3

High Ground.Description: Being above the targets and gaining power behind attacks
High Ground.Stage1: • Being above a target giving 1 stage of Momentum
High Ground.Stage2: • Being above a target giving 2 stage of Momentum
High Ground.Stage3: • Being above a target giving 3 stage of Momentum

Unbalanced.Description: Being above the targets and gaining power behind attacks

• Failed reactions give you a stage of Prone
•Every Physical Action against you can add a Shove Check for 0 AP
